attributes.action: apply diplomatic, economic and military pressure to ensure Israel withdraws to its pre-1967 borders and complies with all outstanding UN resolutions, or face serious consequences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Israel continues to be a rogue state acting against the will of the international community.  There are more outstanding UN resolutions against Israel that any other state.  Israel should not be exempt from facing the will of the international community and remain outside the auspices of international law.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "apply diplomatic, economic and military pressure to ensure Israel withdraws to its pre-1967 borders and complies with all outstanding UN resolutions, or face serious consequences."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15550.asp

Prime Minister's Office
